channel.title: Sre on Edd Mann
channel.description: Recent content in Sre on Edd Mann

item.title: Insight into Site Reliability Engineering with Niall Murphy
item.description: In a recent podcast, I was lucky to have a discussion with Niall Murphy about the role of Site Reliability Engineering. Having contributed to the seminal SRE book, and having experience in this field for many years, it was an honour to get the opportunity to chat with him.
